segments.text: I was supposed to meet with you at half past one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I see . What did you need to see me about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's a problem with my schedule .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Two of my classes occur at the same time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I can see that's a problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it at all possible for you to fix that error ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I can . Would you still like to have both of these classes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to keep both of them , if that's possible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , let me find you one of these classes on a different day .
segments.speaker: S2
